title: Introducing: THIEF
content:
The UK is in the middle of a synth-pop revival, with male/female duo’s seemingly dominating blogs, and independent charts.

With almost every act drawing comparisons to Purity Ring and/or Blue Hawaii, perhaps it’s time that the UK has their very own combo leading the way, and London’s THIEF could perhaps be the ones to claim the territory. With their combo of debut tracks, Friend/Lover and Satine Repeat before released earlier today, their sound is slick, reassuring simplistic yet wonderfully effective. Satine Repeat touches on deep-house elements, whilst Friend/Lover could well be the track to shot them to blog fame. Check out both below.

“don’t wanna be your friend / I wanna be your lover”
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
